title: Loan Application Process and Requirements
description: A comprehensive guide to completing loan applications, understanding documentation requirements, navigating credit evaluation processes, and increasing the likelihood of loan approval across different types of consumer loans.
learning_objectives: Complete a comprehensive loan application with accuracy and required documentation
Identify and gather the necessary documentation for different types of loan applications
Understand how lenders evaluate creditworthiness and assess loan applications
Analyze factors that increase or decrease likelihood of loan approval
Develop strategies to strengthen loan applications and improve approval odds

skill_builder.title: Loan Application Simulator
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students complete realistic loan applications for different scenarios (auto loan, personal loan, mortgage), receive instant feedback on missing or incorrect information, and see how different factors affect their application strength.
